articles.author: Sagar Dua
articles.title: EUR/USD slumps as ECB Lagarde warns of potential Eurozone economic shocks - FXStreet
articles.description: EUR/USD slides to near 1.0830 as the US Dollar (USD) strengthens in North American trading hours on Thursday.
articles.content:
• EUR/USD falls to near 1.0830 as ECB Lagarde expects US President Trump-led trade war could slowdown the Eurozone economic growth.
